properties.Name: FactEmissions
properties.Description:
Scope 1 emissions are direct greenhouse (GHG) emissions that occur from sources that are controlled or owned by an organization (e.g., emissions associated with fuel combustion in boilers, furnaces, vehicles).

Direct emissions from owned or controlled sources

- e.g., on-site electricity generation, heating, cooling, university owned
vehicles, fugitive emissions (e.g. refrigerants), agricultural emissions

Columns.Name: EmissionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an emission

Columns.Name: FacilityId
Columns.Description: The unique indentifier of a facility linked to an emission

Columns.Name: EmissionFactorId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an emission factor

Properties.Description:
Scope 1 emissions are direct greenhouse (GHG) emissions that occur from sources that are controlled or owned by an organization (e.g., emissions associated with fuel combustion in boilers, furnaces, vehicles).

Direct emissions from owned or controlled sources

- e.g., on-site electricity generation, heating, cooling, university owned
vehicles, fugitive emissions (e.g. refrigerants), agricultural emissions
